wikipedia_page.main: Sam Lewis (born 11 November 1990) is a Welsh rugby union player. A flanker, he currently plays for Worcester Warriors.

response: * Sam Lewis (trade unionist) (1901–1976), Australian trade unionist

His brother Sam Lewis is also a professional rugby union player.Sam Lewis Ospreys contract

Sam Lewis (born 27 April 1998) is an English professional rugby union player for Calvisano in Italy's Top10, the top domestic division of rugby union in Italy. His usual positions are either lock or flanker.
